Summary: Noted possible oval craft on 07/12/05 when viewing enclosed photograph.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Sedona
There were no other sightings in Sedona on or around July 5th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsThe enclosed photo of possible interest, an accidental capture, was taken by Al Fortunato at his house under construction in Sedona, Arizona, located by GPS at Lat: 34 49 44 N; Long. - 111 48 44 W, looking East. Time is pending. (Second photo has the object circled in red to facilitate locating.) The image, 2048 x 1536 pixels taken with his Olympus C-730 Ultra-zoom 3.2 megapixel camera, was sent to me at 72 dpi, along with a batch of photos showing the construction progress. The object does not appear in any other image. When I noticed the object and enlarged it, it appears as a fairly well-defined, top-lighted, bottom-shaded oval suggesting a dimensional flying object and not an artifact of the photography. I have Mr. Fortunato's permission and blessings to submit this photo. I still have to find out the time it was taken. The case form is only partially filled out because this is a photo only and the object was only found afterwards by me and brought to the attention of Mr. Fortunato. My MUFON ID No. is 7600.
